instructors.name: Sarah Johnson
instructors.bio: Sarah is a certified yoga instructor with over 8 years of experience. She specializes in Vinyasa and Restorative yoga, helping students find balance between strength and relaxation.

instructors.name: David Goggins
instructors.bio: David brings energy and motivation to every cycling class. His favorite saying is 'They dont know me son.'.

instructors.name: Emma Wilson
instructors.bio: Emma discovered Pilates during her recovery from a sports injury and has been passionate about teaching it ever since. She focuses on proper form and injury prevention.

instructors.name: Carlos Martinez
instructors.bio: Carlos combines his Latin dance background with fitness expertise to create fun, high-energy classes. His infectious enthusiasm makes every class feel like a party.

instructors.name: Jake Thompson
instructors.bio: Jake is a former competitive athlete turned fitness coach. He specializes in strength training and high-intensity workouts designed to push your limits safely.
